captions.text:
Lakshmi is the most important of all the Goddesses
because she represents wealth.
Without wealth everything falls apart.

Generally, Lakshmi is very benign, but this
Lakshmi who is celebrated

during the 9 Nights of the Goddess is also
a ferocious Lakshmi.
She has to fight demons, the demons of poverty.
And the demon needs to be killed.

There is literally no life for one who has
come under poverty.

So, wealth if very important in everybody's
life.

Not only On the earth plane, but even in heaven
if Lakshmi leaves the place it is devastating.

The latest mantra that has been revealed personally
to me for Lakshmi is Brzee.
Close your eyes.
Put your attention on your third eye.

Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, [pronunciado: Brzii],
Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee

Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee,
Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee,

Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee.
Allow the sound to go deep into the 3rd eye.
And from there let it go into the entire brain.
And pervade the whole body.

You don't have to burden to check out what
is going to work for you.

Brzee will be like a watch dog to keep away
wrong projects from your mind.

It'll spontaneously spring the right thought,
the right thought will show up
because of the power of Brzee.
The right project will show up.

Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee.
Absolutely you have no responsibility,
you have given everything to Brzee to control.

Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee,
Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee.

Now join me, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee,
Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee,
Brzee,

Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee,
Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee,

Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee,
Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee,
Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee.

Allow the sound to permeate the mind, the
body and the soul.

Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee,
Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee,

Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee,
Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee,

Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee,
Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee,

Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee,
Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee, Brzee,

Brzee, Brzee. Now, mentally keep repeating
within the 3rd eye.

You are completely giving your financial plans,
future to Brzee.

Let Brzee lead you, control you, take over
you.
Om, Shanti, Shanti, Shanti.
Shanti, Shanti, Shanti.
Slowly, slowly, you can come back to yourself.

title: Learn Goddess Lakshmi Meditation For Wealth
